reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: In country consultations between Mozambique and Finland in March 2009 was agreed that Finland will continue its development cooperation in agricultural sector in Mozambique. The sector is regarded to be a focal sector from the point of view of the develo pment challenges of Mozambique and the development policy of Finland.The Finnish support to the PROAGRI, an agricultural sector program, ended in 2011. The Government of Mozambique has approved a new development strategy PEDSA 2011-2020 for the sector. The objectives of PEDSA are, improvement of the agricultural production, improvement of the access to the markets, sustainable use of the natural resources, development of legislations and agricultural policy, and institutional capacity building. The aim is t o improve food security and to increase the revenues of farmers in a competitive and sustainable way.
